backend/main.mo: Main backend actor handling user profiles and a private per-user Q&A system with access control and CRUD operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module initializing new Q&A data structures from an older message-based actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature mapping file listing implemented frontend components, related features, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind/OKLCH theme defining warm color tokens, dark mode values, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading fonts and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component providing header, navigation tabs, and switching between Q&A and AI Video views.
frontend/src/components/AuthStatus.tsx: Header component showing branding, login/logout controls, and the callerâ€™s profile name.
Placeholder file for the chat message composer (no content provided).
frontend/src/components/MessageFeed.tsx: Placeholder file for the chat message feed (no content provided).
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog prompting new users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/components/QAComposer.tsx: UI component for composing questions with text input, speech-to-text, validation, and submission via createQuestion hook.
frontend/src/components/QAItemCard.tsx: Displays a question with optional answer editing, saving, and text-to-speech playback using related hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnswerQuestion.ts: Mutation hook that submits an answer to a question and invalidates the questions query on success.
Hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile using the backend actor with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatMessages.ts: Empty placeholder file for future chat message logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateQuestion.ts: Mutation hook that sends a new question to the backend and refreshes the questions list.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handles identity loading, login, and logout via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQuestions.ts: Fetches the latest questions from the backend actor and sorts them by creation time.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollAnchor.ts: Empty placeholder file for future scroll anchor behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useSendMessage.ts: Empty placeholder file for message-sending functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Implements speech-to-text using the browser SpeechRecognition API with Nepali language support.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextToSpeech.ts: Provides text-to-speech playback with Nepali voice selection and speaking state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive OKLCH-based theme variables for light and dark modes, plus base styling for body and borders.
frontend/src/lib/chatValidation.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Provides a helper to trigger browser file downloads using a temporary anchor element.
frontend/src/lib/localClipGenerator.ts: Generates a placeholder video-like blob by drawing styled text and gradients on a canvas and returning a downloadable mp4 blob URL.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AIVideoPage.tsx: Implements a UI for generating, validating, listing, and downloading placeholder AI video clips using local generation logic.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Empty page component with no content.
frontend/src/pages/MyQAPage.tsx: Displays authenticated users' Nepali Q&A with profile checks, loading states, question listing, and a composer interface.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH theme colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, including features for private Nepali voice-enabled Q&A, Internet Identity authentication, and pending requirements for per-user privacy and Q&A storage. Lists existing features, new feature requests, architectural notes, and metadata.
